attributes.action: Force councils to scrap or severly reduce car parking charges during the recession
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
With car park charges, people are thinking twice to go and park their for shopping, eating out etc.

Due to this shops and businesses in these towns and cities suffer from reduced sales as people are travelling elsewhere where parking is free or do their shopping on the internet etc.

Due to the recession, businesses need every customer as possible and councils charging to park is going against this. Councils say that they need the revenue from car parking. My first piece of advice is for councils to start switching off lights when theit buildings are empty!
